00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Parameters
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00012

00020 !

00028 
00029  SUBROUTINE Parameters
00030 
00031 ! Common Variables
00032  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00033  USE Domain
00034  USE FluidParams
00035  USE LBMParams
00036  USE MPIParams
00037  USE MPI
00038  IMPLICIT NONE
00039 
00040 ! Local Variables
00041  INTEGER :: i
00042  INTEGER :: IO_ERR, MPI_ERR
00043  INTEGER, DIMENSION (1:10) :: intParam
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION (1:7) :: dblParam
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: bubblesVec
00046 
00047 
00048 ! Read parameter data from file "properties.in" in master node
00049  IF (proc == master) THEN
00050    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "properties.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00051         IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00052    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00053      READ(10,*)
00054      READ(10,*) Maxstep
00055      READ(10,*)
00056      READ(10,*) tStat, tDump
00057      READ(10,*)
00058      READ(10,*) xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax
00059      READ(10,*)
00060      READ(10,*) rhoL, rhoH
00061      READ(10,*)
00062      READ(10,*) tauL, tauH
00063      READ(10,*)
00064      READ(10,*) IntWidth, sigma
00065      READ(10,*)
00066      READ(10,*) pConv
00067      READ(10,*)
00068      READ(10,*) mpi_xdim, mpi_ydim
00069      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00070    ELSE
00071      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00072      STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'properties.in'."
00073    END IF
00074 
00075 ! Read bubble/drop positions from file "discrete.in"
00076    OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "discrete.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00077       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00078    IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00079      READ(10,*)
00080      READ(10,*) nBubbles
00081      READ(10,*)
00082      ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:3) )
00083      ALLOCATE( bubblesVec(1:nBubbles*3) )
00084      DO i = 1, nBubbles
00085        READ(10,*) bubblesVec(i), bubblesVec(i+nBubbles), bubblesVec(i+2*nBubbles)
00086      END DO
00087      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00088    ELSE
00089      CALL MPI_FINALIZE(MPI_ERR)
00090      STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'discrete.in'."
00091    END IF
00092 
00093 ! Save input data in arrays for MPI broadcast
00094    intParam(1)  = MaxStep
00095    intParam(2)  = tStat
00096    intParam(3)  = tDump
00097    intParam(4)  = xmin
00098    intParam(5)  = xmax
00099    intParam(6)  = ymin
00100    intParam(7)  = ymax
00101    intParam(8)  = mpi_xdim
00102    intParam(9)  = mpi_ydim
00103    intParam(10) = nBubbles
00104 
00105    dblParam(1) = rhoL
00106    dblParam(2) = rhoH
00107    dblParam(3) = tauL
00108    dblParam(4) = tauH
00109    dblParam(5) = IntWidth
00110    dblParam(6) = sigma
00111    dblParam(7) = pConv
00112  END IF
00113 
00114 ! Broadcast values of parameters from the master to all other processors
00115  CALL MPI_BCAST(intParam, 10, MPI_INTEGER, master, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERR)
00116  CALL MPI_BCAST(dblParam,  7, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, master, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERR)
00117 
00118 ! Assign parameter data to locally named variables in slave nodes
00119  IF(proc /= master) THEN
00120    MaxStep   = intParam(1)
00121    tStat     = intParam(2)
00122    tDump     = intParam(3)
00123    xmin      = intParam(4)
00124    xmax      = intParam(5)
00125    ymin      = intParam(6)
00126    ymax      = intParam(7)
00127    mpi_xdim  = intParam(8)
00128    mpi_ydim  = intParam(9)
00129    nBubbles  = intParam(10)
00130 
00131    rhoL     = dblParam(1)
00132    rhoH     = dblParam(2)
00133    tauL     = dblParam(3)
00134    tauH     = dblParam(4)
00135    IntWidth = dblParam(5)
00136    sigma    = dblParam(6)
00137    pConv    = dblParam(7)
00138 
00139    ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:3) )
00140    ALLOCATE( bubblesVec(1:nBubbles*3) )
00141  END IF
00142 
00143 !  Broadcast bubble/drop information from master to all other processors
00144  CALL MPI_BCAST(bubblesVec, nBubbles*3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, master, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_ERR)
00145 
00146 ! Scale parameters for order parameter mesh
00147    sigma    = 2.D0*sigma
00148    IntWidth = 2.D0*IntWidth
00149 !  Save ans scale bubble/drop data in local array bubbles(xc,yc,Rc)
00150  DO i = 1, nBubbles
00151    bubbles(i,1) = 2*bubblesVec(i) - 1            ! xc(i)
00152    bubbles(i,2) = 2*bubblesVec(i+nBubbles) - 1   ! yc(i)
00153    bubbles(i,3) = 2*bubblesVec(i+2*nBubbles)     ! Rc(i)
00154  END DO
00155  DEALLOCATE( bubblesVec )
00156 
00157 !--------- Definition of globally defined (common) simulation constants --------
00158 ! Constants needed in
00159  beta    = 12.D0*sigma/( IntWidth*( (rhoH - rhoL)**4 ) )
00160  kappa   = 1.5D0*sigma*IntWidth/( (rhoH - rhoL)**2 )
00161  beta4   = 4.0D0*beta
00162  kappaG  = 0.25D0*kappa
00163  kappaEf = 8.D0*inv12*kappaG
00164  kappa_6 = inv6*kappa
00165  rhostar = 0.5D0*( rhoL + rhoH )
00166  tauRhoStar = (tauH - tauL)/(rhoH - rhoL)
00167 
00168 ! Viscosity of the fluids
00169  muH = tauH*rhoH*Cs_sq
00170  muL = tauL*rhoL*Cs_sq
00171 
00172 ! Redefine MaxStep (iterate between 0 and MaxStep-1)
00173  MaxStep = MaxStep - 1
00174 
00175  RETURN
00176  END SUBROUTINE Parameters
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:10 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
